channel.title: I cant run any source and client?
channel.description:
hello i have buy yesterday a new computer. I have download java and jdk on that computer but when i want rune a source ore client it say::::
The system can not find the path specified. press any key to continue
plz some 1 help my :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: I cant run any source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Yeah Download it,
Then Install it,
After that take the code i posted earlier,
Edit your Runserver.bat File By Right Clicking on it.
Then Press on “Edit” And a NotePad File Will Open Up.
Replace my code with the one you have in the notepad file,
And After All That Run Your Server!

item.source: I cant run any source and client?

item.title: I cant run any source and client?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Edit your Runserver.bat file by right clicking on it then pressing on “Edit”

Replace the whole code in it with this one:

@echo off color 81 title MyServerNameHere java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

This should work.

Read full topic
